concept.title: Sharing a YouTube video
concept.shortdesc: The More Actions feature allows users to access the features within a meeting, roll over the bottom of the meeting window and click the three dots for settings.

conbody.p: Depending on if the participant joins as an authenticated user vs guest, the following options will display in the More Actions section.

Share a YouTube video
This feature is only available for authenticated users.
When moderator settings permit, the user can click this option to share a video link and play directly in the meeting for other participants to watch. More information is available in the YouTube Integration section.
